definitions.definition: A small ball of chemical pesticide (typically naphthalene ) and deodorant placed in or around clothing and other articles susceptible to damage from mold or moth larvae in order to protect them from this damage.

main_definition: ( usually in the plural ) A small ball of chemical pesticide (typically naphthalene ) and deodorant placed in or around clothing and other articles susceptible to damage from mold or moth larvae in order to protect them from this damage.
